description: A large frozen lake on Punk Hazard created from the massive crater formed during the legendary ten-day duel between Admirals Akainu and Aokiji for the Fleet Admiral position.

keyEvents.description: Brownbeard's centaur patrol attacks the Straw Hats at the lake
keyEvents.significance: Site of first major confrontation on Punk Hazard's ice side

keyEvents.description: Zoro is dragged underwater by sharks inhabiting the lake
keyEvents.significance: Reveals the lake contains ocean water, making it deadly for Devil Fruit users

keyEvents.description: The lake's origin is revealed as the crater from Akainu and Aokiji's duel
keyEvents.significance: Connects to major world events and demonstrates the scale of Admiral powers

reveals.information: The lake was formed from the crater created by Akainu and Aokiji's ten-day duel
The lake contains ocean water and is inhabited by sharks

culturalSignificance: Represents the aftermath of one of the most significant battles in recent Marine history, permanently scarring the landscape of Punk Hazard.
